ribbon.mp4.description: I tested a present that wraps things ALL BY ITSELF… and now I’m gift-wrapped too 🎀😂🎄 #PipsProjects #GiftWrapFail #ChristmasChaos #HolidayWorkshop #CuteOtter

cocoa.mp4.description: I made a cocoa delivery sled for my lab and almost spilled EVERYTHING 😳☕❄️ but I saved it!! #PipsProjects #HotCocoa #WinterMagic #ChristmasCozy #CuteOtter
cocoa.mp4.title: The Cocoa Sled

candycane.mp4.description: Today I discovered a candy-cane tool that fixes stuff with JINGLES and peppermint snow!! I’m basically Santa’s tiniest mechanic 🎄🔧 #PipsProjects #ChristmasMagic #WinterWorkshop #CuteOtter #HolidayDIY
candycane.mp4.title: Pip & The Candy Cane Wrench

spain.mp4.description: I practiced the 12-grape lucky countdown and my nose got involved 😳🍇✨ but I’m READY for midnight! #PipsProjects #NewYearsEve #12Grapes #LuckyOtter #ScienceMagic #Spain

japan.mp4.description: I rang my bubble-bell to “clear out the old year” and now my workshop feels sparkly-clean inside my brain 🫧🔔✨ #PipsProjects #NewYearsTraditions #JoyaNoKane #CozyOtter #FreshStart #Japan
